mapper.select: select n.no_no, n.no_kind, n.no_subject, n.no_content, a.adm_name, to_char(n.no_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') as no_date from notice n join admin a on a.adm_no = n.adm_no order by n.no_no desc
select no_no, no_kind, no_subject, no_content, a.adm_no ,to_char(no_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') as no_date from notice n join admin a on a.adm_no = n.adm_no where no_no=#{no_no} order by no_no desc
